DEVOPSDAYS TEL AVIV 2025

December 11, 2025 at Expo Tel Aviv!




KEYNOTE SPEAKER

Building Docker: Behind the Scenes of the Container Revolution

We are thrilled to announce that Solomon Hykes, creator of Docker, CEO and Co-Founder of Dagger will be taking the stage at the upcoming DevOpsDays TLV as our KEYNOTE SPEAKER!

So let's show him some fine TLV hospitality!

DevOpsDays Tel-Aviv is back for its ELEVENTH EVENT to celebrate our AWESOME TLVCOMMUNITY representing all topics from DevOps Tel Aviv to Cloud Native & OSS Day Tel Aviv, Serverless TLV, and Statscraft.

DevOpsDays Tel Aviv is part of the global devopsdays event series, bringing in participants from the entire global devopsdays community. To learn more, you can visit our event on the main devopsdays.org website.

Join leading industry speakers along with DevOps, SRE, platform, production and operations engineers for two full days of sessions focusing on best practices in modern engineering - from the infrastructure and operations to the systems and processes.

Tickets are now on sale - so now's the time to register!
